codes.code: argmax 'The task requires answering a series of questions in Latin related to various topics including geographical locations, Latin vocabulary, and basic Latin concepts. You must comprehend the question and provide an accurate and grammatically correct response in Latin. Provide the answer only. 1. Saccus quī hīc est = h~ saccus. Choose from this set of possible answers [ ic, aec, oc, ae aec, od oc, ī ic] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-davinci-002' where ANSWER in [ 'ic', 'aec', 'oc', 'ae aec', 'od oc', 'ī ic']
